Sentencas: A parametric study is conducted on a hybrid SOFC-GT cycle as part of a national program aiming to improve the efficiency of the actual gas turbine power plants and to better undertake the future investigations.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: The proposed power plant is mainly constituted by a Gas Turbine cycle, a SOFC system, and an ammonia water absorption refrigerating system.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: An external pre-reformer is installed before the SOFC.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: Heat recovery systems are adopted to valorize the waste heat at the SOFC and GT exhausts.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: The gas from the SOFC exhaust is also used as additional supply for the combustion chamber.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: An extraction is performed on the gas Turbine in order to feed the SOFC cycle by thermal heat flux at medium pressure.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: The equations governing the electrochemical processes, the energy and the exergy balances of the power plant components are established.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: Numerical simulation using EES software is performed.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: The influences of key operating parameters, such as humidity, pre-reforming fraction, extraction fraction from the Gas Turbine and fuel utilization on the performances of the SOFC-GT hybrid system are analyzed.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: Obtained results show that the integration of the SOFC enhances significantly the hybrid overall cycle efficiency.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: The increase of the ambient temperature and humidity reduces the system efficiencies.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: The utilization factor has a negative effect on the SOFC temperature and voltage.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: That leads to a decrease in the power plant performances.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: While the pre-reforming fraction, has a positive effect on the indicated parameters.
Titulo: Energetic and exergetic parametric study of a SOFC-GT hybrid power plant
